text: Whether you keep up with them or not, it's been hard to avoid this week's instalment of Kardashian drama. Khloé Kardashian, the youngest sister of the famous family — not counting Kendall and Kylie, who are technically Jenners — is due to give birth to her first child any day now, and her boyfriend, Tristan Thompson, has been allegedly caught out cheating on her. As with all Kardashian - related stories, there are many parts to this, and it can be hard to keep up with all of it. If you need a handy breakdown of everything that's happened, keep reading. Khloé And Tristan's Story Khloé Kardashian, 33, and Tristan Thompson, 27, were first linked together in August 2016
